summary: this adds a player house across the river from Riverwood read Main Description for more info
descriptionHtml:
Description>>>>
theres a giant house across from Riverwood that has been vacant due to the Helgen attack and the escaped Prisoner has first pick. It has some Dwemer resemblance. 

Installation >>>>

With Nexus Mod Manager just click Download with Manager, then enable the mod from the list and launch Skyrim.

To Manually Install it, just extract the .esp file into your Skyrim/Data folder, then make sure the plugin is enabled at launch.

Uninstall >>>>>

1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file.
2. Delete the .esp file from \\Skyrim\\Data\\

NMM users:

1. Start NMM Launcher, uncheck the .esp file.
2.Delete the .esp file from \\Skyrim\\Data\\

Changelog 1.1
* Removed Crystals from Bridge
* Redone basement
* Added more weapon racks
* Now has more Mannequins
* Put 2 thalmor banners in grand staircase (will retexture when I figure out how and have time)
* Put stainglass window in grand staircase (will retexture when I figure out how and have time)
* Put 4 bookcases under grand staircase
* Added more Storage (there will be more)
* Added more stuff to bedroom and Merchant room
* Changed up the mounted animals
* Working on outside garden

Changelog 1.2
* thalmor banners have been retextured but not for the whole game just this mod =)
* Stainglass window has been retextured
* 10 Display cases have been placed in Merchant room
* Garden finally bare of grass...there is a CK bug that dont update CK of Grass location..had to go ingame to find out if grass was removed
* Wall where banners and window are is also retextured
* Started work on Merchant and also fix the double stairs into one big staircase


Credit >>>>
Bethesda For the Game 
Me for making the Mod :)
author: Forzane Inc
